annotations.description: This weeks episode of Patron Exclusive Drinks I've never had I'm making Black Stripe, a weird combo of rum and molasses. ********************************** M...
annotations.title: Black Stripe | Drinks I've Never Had!

textContent:
2 oz White or Jamaican Rum
.5 oz Dark Molasses

Stir together and fill with hot water. 
Garnish with grated nutmeg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OIvVhpzAy5k
title: Black Stripe
